title: Fmr. Amb. Michael McFaul: Inside Putin's Ukraine endgame
description: Young Russian men are fleeing their country, as Russian President Vladimir Putin makes a surprise announcement drafting additional troops into his invasion of Ukraine. Former U.S. Ambassador to Russia Michael McFaul joins Chuck to analyze Putin's fluctuating strategy, as his originally planned swift incursion meets the stronger-than-expected shield of the Ukrainian defense.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
